title: Electrodynamics
brief_description: The following fundamental principles of current electricity and electro-magnetism are presented in this film: Galvani’s discovery of current electricity; a magnetic field about a current-carrying wire; the magnetic field of a coil; electromagnets; Rowland’s experiment; magnetic hypothesis; recalescence; induction by a magnet; AC and DC generators; induction by an electric current; and transformers and their function.
